entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 40. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
